summary: A couple having an affair strike a bicyclist with their car and do not offer aid out of fear of their relationship being exposed.
cast: Lucia Bosè|Alberto Closas|Bruna Corrà|Carlos Casaravilla|Otello Toso|Alicia Romay|Julia Delgado Caro|Matilde Muñoz Sampedro|Mercedes Albert|José Sepúlveda|José Prada|Fernando Sancho|Manuel Alexandre|Jacinto San Emeterio|Manuel Arbó|Emilio Alonso|Margarita Espinosa|Rufino Inglés|Antonio Casas|Manuel Guitián|Elisa Méndez|José María Rodríguez|Carmen Castellanos|José María Gavilán|José Navarro|Gracia Montes|Valeriano Andrés|Elsa Fábregas|Manuel Rojas
director: Director: Juan Antonio Bardem (as J.A. Bardem)
title: Muerte de un ciclista
